comment.author: Brianna
comment.text: I hope Donald loses because he can't relate to anyone socially or emotionally, or in any way possible. What can he do for the poor people? Nothing but give whites a small loan of a million dollars.

replies.author: Ryley
replies.text: Here's your sign...Clinton.media.mit.org All her lies have been leaked. Wise up

replies.text: I tried to connect but it said the link isn't working...Dems are censoring again, I guess.
